Legal_Issue: Whether the Refugee Protection Division's decision to disregard a late-submitted letter was procedurally fair
Application_Facts: Applicants' brother was allegedly assassinated, prompting their refugee claim; a key letter was submitted after the deadline
Decision_Outcome: Application for judicial review granted; case referred for rehearing with a different member
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of the decision to exclude late evidence
Court_Ruling: The presiding member violated Rule 30 by refusing to consider the letter without assessing its relevance or probative value
Defendant_Behavior: Refused to consider late-submitted evidence without evaluating relevance or probative value
Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution due to family member's assassination
Legal_Standard: Procedural fairness under Rule 29 and Rule 30 of the Refugee Protection Division Rules
Assessment_Factor: Relevance and probative value of late evidence
Procedural_Issue: Exclusion of evidence without proper procedural assessment
Application_Basis: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Relief_Sought: Rehearing of the case with proper consideration of late evidence
Governing_Rule: Rule 30 requires consideration of relevance and probative value of late evidence
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Failure to assess relevance and probative value of late submission
Outcome: Case remitted for rehearing before a different member
Harm_Assessment: Potential denial of fair hearing due to exclusion of potentially relevant evidence
Cause_Description: Applicants' brother was allegedly assassinated, forming the basis of their refugee claim
Evidence_Handling: Late evidence excluded without analysis of relevance or probative value
Legal_Provision_Violated: Rule 30 of the Refugee Protection Division Rules
Evidence_Issues: Failure to evaluate admissibility under procedural rules
Evidence_Assessment: Required but not conducted: assessment of relevance and probative value
Decision_Rationale: Procedural fairness requires evaluation of late evidence under Rule 30 before exclusion
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of assessment of relevance and probative value
